channel.title: Home on Khaled Nassar
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Khaled Nassar

item.title: [IBM] XSS Reflected via xml files
item.description: Hello World ðŸ‘‹ while I’m doing some bug hunting on IBM subdomains I decided instead of using subdomain enumeration I can get interesting endpoints and parameters from waybackurls to shorten the time, after reading the URLs from waybackurls I noticed a lot of endpoints that contain some URLs of XML files in rssurl parameter https://www-356.ibm.com/partnerworld/wps/servlet/pwdyn/pw/rss/rsstojson.jsp?ccdb=no&rssurl=https://www-2000.ibm.com/file.xml&_=1596170198353 all this API endpoint do is read the XML from the URL and then return its value of it but in JSON, for the first time I thought there was an SSRF but after a lot of trying to bypass it, it doesn’t work at all

item.title: Projects
item.description: » Scant3r this is a module-based web automation tool that I made for saving my scripting time by providing some utilizes that every web pentester needs in his automation script instead of focusing on ( logger, parsers, output function, cmd args, multi-threading), just write the logic of your scanning idea with scant3r utils without caring about these things, you can find callback/parsing/logging utils and output functions, Also we will add Restful API soon what if you need to add a new Command option to scant3r for your script?

item.title: Blacklock Log4j Scanner
item.description: Project URL Description log4j scanner crawls your web application to identify the URLs, parameters, request headers and probe them with log4j attack payloads to detect the vulnerability

item.title: Hacking lab
item.description: Project URL Small Vulnerable Web application that can be used for training path traversal XSS Stored/Rfelected SQLI SSTI CSRF SSRF RCE Broken Session Management open redirect

item.title: Lorsrf
item.description: Project URL lorsrf is just a web pentesting tool that i wrote in Rust for find the parameters that can be used to find SSRF or Out-of-band resource load by adding OAST host like Burp Collaborator to the parameter value

item.title: Scant3r
item.description: Project URL Description this is a module-based web automation tool that I made for saving my scripting time by providing some utilizes that every web pentester needs in his automation script instead of focusing on ( logger, parsers, output function, cmd args, multi-threading), just write the logic of your scanning idea with scant3r utils without caring about these things, you can find callback/parsing/logging utils and output functions
